outline:
1. who, which, that
  2. that of, which belongs to, that
  3. that, because
kjv_def: [idiom] as, but, for(-asmuch [phrase]), [phrase] now, of, seeing, than, that, therefore, until, [phrase] what (-soever), when, which, whom, whose.
strongs_def: that, used as relative conjunction, and especially (with a preposition) in adverbial phrases; also as preposition of
